short_summary: The Department of Public Works and Government Services is seeking consultantsto undertake feasibility studies and design reports for the structural. repairs of the lantern room floors structure.
description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking proposals from consultants to undertake a feasibility study and provide a concept design report for repairing the lantern room floor structure and addressing ongoing water infiltration concerns at the Cape Race Lighthouse in Cape Race, Newfoundland and Labrador.
